IN RE: ESTATE OF Lester Frank SUMRALL, Deceased Lester L. Sumrall, Appellant/Petitioner,
v.
Angela N. Grabowski, Appellee/Counter-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 71A05-1710-ES-2476 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED May 21, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

BRADFORD , J.

Affirmed.

BAKER, J., Concurs.

KIRSCH, J., Concurs.
